tasks.title: Assess tree-sitter upgrade blast radius
tasks.description: dependency-migration benchmark scenario: Assess tree-sitter upgrade blast radius.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Assess tree-sitter upgrade blast radius. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Assess tree-sitter upgrade blast radius. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Assess tree-sitter upgrade blast radius. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
